descriptions: Student does not demonstrate an understanding of place value.
Student shows limited understanding of place value concepts; struggles to identify place values beyond the ones and tens places.
Student demonstrates a basic understanding of place value, but may make errors when identifying places in larger numbers or when explaining the value of a digit.
Student demonstrates a solid understanding of place value for whole numbers up to the millions place, and can explain the value of a digit correctly most of the time.
Student demonstrates a strong understanding of place value, accurately identifying and explaining the value of digits in multi-digit whole numbers.

Student demonstrates a comprehensive and nuanced understanding of place value, accurately identifying and explaining the value of digits in multi-digit whole numbers, and can apply this understanding to complex problems.
Student is unable to round numbers or demonstrates no understanding of rounding rules.
Student attempts to round numbers but consistently makes errors, indicating a lack of understanding of rounding rules.
Student can round numbers to the nearest ten or hundred with some accuracy, but struggles with rounding to other places or with larger numbers.
Student can accurately round numbers to the nearest ten, hundred, or thousand, but may make occasional errors with larger numbers or less common place values.
Student accurately rounds multi-digit whole numbers to any place value with few errors, demonstrating a strong grasp of rounding concepts.
Student consistently and accurately rounds multi-digit whole numbers to any place value, demonstrating a deep understanding of rounding concepts and their application.
Student cannot explain the process of rounding or why it is used.
Student attempts to explain the rounding process but provides an unclear or inaccurate explanation.
Student can explain the basic steps of rounding but struggles to articulate the reasoning behind them.
Student can adequately explain the process of rounding and the general reasoning behind it.
Student clearly and concisely explains the process of rounding, including the rules and the reasoning behind them.
Student provides a thorough and insightful explanation of the rounding process, including the rules, the reasoning, and the practical applications of rounding in various contexts.
